attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick of self-opinionated BBC presenters telling the world what everybody thinks - and their opinions are not mine so speak for yourself.   I believe Gordan Brown is being attacked by the right wing press - don't believe everthing you hear. Can James Purnell ever be trusted again or perhaps he will join the Tories. Of course the Tories want an election, but hold on Gordan, you're the best person for the job.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
